mcv.mcv.help: Get the latest version of Minecraft: Java Edition in the launcher.
mcv.mcbv.help: Get the latest version of Minecraft: Bedrock Edition on Mojira.
mcv.mcdv.help: Get the latest version of Minecraft Dungeons on Mojira.
mcv.mcev.help: Get the latest version of Minecraft: Education Edition in Windows Edition.
mcv.mcv.message.message1: The latest release: ${release}, the latest snapshot: ${snapshot},

mcv.mcbv.message.play_store: Currently the latest version in Google Play Store is:
mcv.mcdv.message:
The latest version: ${mcdversion}
(The data from Mojira may be earlier than the official release. Information is for reference purposes only).
